languages.text: "Повторишь это своему фальшивому божку, когда отправишься на тот свет, служка смерти. Я рад, что смогу расправиться с вами {mf|обоими|обеими} за раз". {n}Второй пистолет смотрит теперь на Кибеллу.{/n} "Обещаю, ваша палаческая секта падет сразу после гибели Лорд-капитана".

"Save your message for your false god when you meet him, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Повторишь это своему фальшивому божку, когда отправишься на тот свет, служка смерти. Я рад, что смогу расправиться с вами {mf|обоими|обеими} за раз". {n}Второй пистолет смотрит теперь на Кибеллу.{/n} "Обещаю, ваша палаческая секта падет сразу после гибели Лорд-капитана".

traits.locale_text: "Say that to your false god when you go to the afterlife, servant of death. I am glad I can take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now looking at Kibellah.{/n} "I promise your murderous sect will fall with the Lord Captain."

"Say that to your false god when you go to the afterlife, servant of death. I am glad I can take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now looking at Kibellah.{/n} "I promise your murderous sect will fall with the Lord Captain."

"Save your message for your false god in the afterlife, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."

"Save your message for your false god in the afterlife, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."

"Save your message for your false god when you meet him, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."

"Save your message for your false god when you meet him, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Spart Euch Eure Botschaft für Euren falschen Gott, wenn Ihr ihn trefft, {mf|Diener|Dienerin} des Todes. Ich freue mich, dass ich Euch beide auf einmal niederstrecken kann." {n}Die zweite Waffe ist jetzt auf Kibellah gerichtet.{/n} "Ich schwöre, dass Eure mörderische Sekte zusammen mit dem Lord Captain untergehen wird."
languages.original_text: "Save your message for your false god when you meet him, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Spart Euch Eure Botschaft für Euren falschen Gott, wenn Ihr ihn trefft, {mf|Diener|Dienerin} des Todes. Ich freue mich, dass ich Euch beide auf einmal niederstrecken kann." {n}Die zweite Waffe ist jetzt auf Kibellah gerichtet.{/n} "Ich schwöre, dass Eure mörderische Sekte zusammen mit dem Lord Captain untergehen wird."

languages.text: «Guárdate el mensaje para tu falso dios cuando lo encuentres, sirvienta de la muerte. Me alegro de poder librarme de l{mf|o|a}s dos al mismo tiempo». {n}La segunda pistola apunta ahora a Kibellah.{/n} «Juro que tu secta asesina caerá junto con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Save your message for your false god when you meet him, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Guárdate el mensaje para tu falso dios cuando lo encuentres, sirvienta de la muerte. Me alegro de poder librarme de l{mf|o|a}s dos al mismo tiempo». {n}La segunda pistola apunta ahora a Kibellah.{/n} «Juro que tu secta asesina caerá junto con {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「お前の偽りの神に会ったときのために言葉はとっておけ、死の従者よ。ふたり一度に倒せて嬉しいよ」{n}2丁目の銃がキベラに向けられた。{/n}「誓おう。お前の人殺し部隊は、ロード・キャプテンと共に倒れると」
languages.original_text: "Save your message for your false god when you meet him, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の偽りの神に会ったときのために言葉はとっておけ、死の従者よ。ふたり一度に倒せて嬉しいよ」{n}2丁目の銃がキベラに向けられた。{/n}「誓おう。お前の人殺し部隊は、ロード・キャプテンと共に倒れると」

languages.text: “死亡的仆人啊，等你见到你那位伪神的时候，记得把这句话说给他听。我很高兴能同时把你们两个一起干掉。”{n}他手里的第二把枪对准了绮贝菈。{/n}“我在此发誓，你的杀人教派和你的领主舰长将会一起灭亡。”
languages.original_text: "Save your message for your false god when you meet him, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “死亡的仆人啊，等你见到你那位伪神的时候，记得把这句话说给他听。我很高兴能同时把你们两个一起干掉。”{n}他手里的第二把枪对准了绮贝菈。{/n}“我在此发誓，你的杀人教派和你的领主舰长将会一起灭亡。”

languages.text: « Gardez votre message pour votre faux dieu lorsque vous vous présenterez à lui, servante de la mort. Je suis heureux d'avoir la chance de pouvoir vous tuer {mf|tous|toutes} les deux en même temps, {n}dit-il en braquant son deuxième pistolet sur Kibellah.{/n} Je fais le serment d'anéantir votre secte meurtrière en même temps que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Save your message for your false god when you meet him, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Gardez votre message pour votre faux dieu lorsque vous vous présenterez à lui, servante de la mort. Je suis heureux d'avoir la chance de pouvoir vous tuer {mf|tous|toutes} les deux en même temps, {n}dit-il en braquant son deuxième pistolet sur Kibellah.{/n} Je fais le serment d'anéantir votre secte meurtrière en même temps que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Mesajını sahte tanrınla karşılaşacağın zamana sakla ölümün hizmetkârı. İkinizi birden alt etme şansı yakaladığım için çok memnunum." {n}İkinci silah, Kibellah'ya çevrilmiş durumda.{/n} "Ölüm saçan tarikatının Lord Kaptan'la birlikte yok olacağına ant içerim."
languages.original_text: "Save your message for your false god when you meet him, servant of death. I am glad I get to take you both down at once." {n}The second gun is now pointing at Kibellah.{/n} "I vow that your murderous sect will fall along with the Lord Captain."
